Topic.Title: Can I Open a Saved Quest File in Browser Edition?

Posts.EditableText: I used  to have the Quest program downloaded on my Windows computer, and I created a few partial games. I saved these .aslx files on an external hard drive to save them. Now I am trying to use the browser Quest on my Ubuntu laptop, and I am wondering if there is any way to access these files through the browser version? Or is there a version of the program I can use with the Linux operating system?
Posts.HTML: I used to have the Quest program downloaded on my Windows computer, and I created a few partial games. I saved these .aslx files on an external hard drive to save them. Now I am trying to use the browser Quest on my Ubuntu laptop, and I am wondering if there is any way to access these files through the browser version? Or is there a version of the program I can use with the Linux operating system?

Posts.EditableText: Alex may be able to upload your games, but the likes of you and I cannot.
Posts.HTML: Alex may be able to upload your games, but the likes of you and I cannot.
